title: Letterhead, "Letterhead for the UPA (United Productions of America), Burbank, CA", ca. 1947
medium: Letterpress with black, blue, yellow and red ink on white wove paper
inscribed:
Imprinted in the upper left in black ink: United/Productions of/ America
Across the bottom: California address: 4440 Laneside Drive, Burbank, California Telephone Charleston 0-7171/ New York address: 670 Fifth Avenue New York 19, New York Telephone Plaza 3-1672
creditline: Gift of Tamar Cohen and Dave Slatoff
description: To the left of the company name is a logo with the letters UPA. Each letter is inside an oval of color. The U is inside a blue oval, the P inside a yellow one and the A inside a red one.

tombstone.epitaph:
Letterhead, "Letterhead for the UPA (United Productions of America), Burbank, CA", ca. 1947.
ca. 1947. Letterpress with black, blue, yellow and red ink on white wove paper. Gift of Tamar Cohen and Dave Slatoff. 1993-31-161.
